DOC.brief_title: The Effects Exercise Adipokine Impaired Fasting Glucose Impaired Glucose Tolerance Patients
DOC.detailed_description: Backgrounds : Type 2 diabetes mellitus cause genetic environmental factor . Type 2 diabetes could prevent modify environmental risk factor physical inactivity , heavy eating , obesity . It report regular physical training could prevent progression diabetes prediabetes impair glucose tolerance ( IGT ) impair fast glucose ( IFG ) . Prediabetes , term IGT IFG , could progress type 2 diabetes 30~40 % within 4~5 year . Moreover , cardiovascular cerebrovascular event increase prediabetic patient like type 2 diabetic patient . Adipose tissue think endocrine organ secret regulate various hormone know adipokines include adiponectin , resistin , leptin , visfatin , tumor necrosis factor ( TNF ) -α , interleukin-6 ( IL-6 ) , retinol-binding protein 4 ( RBP 4 ) . Recently , many adipokines think related metabolic disturbance glucose intolerance , dyslipidemia , insulin resistance . Adiponectin known anti-diabetic factor exert action muscle fatty acid oxidation insulin sensitivity . Plasma adiponectin level significantly decrease obese , type 2 diabetes , insulin resistant patient correlate insulin sensitivity . Also , adiponectin anti-inflammatory anti-atherogenic effect . So , adiponectin representative insulin sensitivity marker may protective factor development type diabetes . In previous data , discrepancy effect exercise adiponectin level . Some study show exercise intervention could effect adiponectin level . However , study suggest physical fitness may increase adiponectin level obese insulin resistant adult . RBP-4 , secrete adiocytes , effect reduce glucose transporter 4 ( GLUT 4 ) adipocytes increase gluconeogenesis enzyme activity PEPCK liver . Also , know RBP-4 elevated insulin resistant patient type 2 diabetes obesity . After exercise training , RBP-4 level decrease subject improvement insulin resistance . Adrenomedullin ( AM ) , originally isolate pheochromocytoma , recently report adipokine . AM highly express adipocyte high fat diet mouse obese rat model elevate type 2 diabetic patient . Also , AM expression white brown adipose tissue increase adrenergic stimulation . So , expect AM expression change exercise . In study , examine various adipokine level adiponectin , RBP-4 , adrenomedullin exercise training exercise prescription IFG IGT patient . Methods Subjects Subjects IFG IGT basis 75g oral glucose tolerance test ( OGTT ) accord American Diabetes Association criterion study . Inclusion Criteria 1 . Age ; 30~70 2 . Subjects IGT IFG 3 . Subjects possibility exercise stress test 4 . Subjects strong study Exclusion Criteria 1 . Age < 30 > 70 2 . Cr 1.5 mg/dL 3 . AST , ALT level twice upper normal range 4 . Dietary pattern data – FFQ 3 day dietary recall Baseline – FFQ 3 day dietary recall 2nd visit - 3 day dietary recall 3rd visit - 3 day dietary recall After 1 year – FFQ 7 . Exercise pattern data - International Physical Activity Questionnaire ( IPAQ ) 1st , 2nd , 3rd visits- IPAQ 8 ) We compare parameter accord result IPAQ ( tertile ) 9 ) We adjust parameter dietary pattern 10 ) Anthropometric measurement - Height , weight , BMI , waist circumference , hip circumference 11 ) Exercise capacity – exercise tolerance test Vmax O2 12 ) Biochemical marker - Glucose , HbA1C , WBC , AST , ALT , GGT , total cholesterol , triglyceride , HDL cholesterol , insulin , C-peptide 13 ) Adipokine - adiponectine , RBP-4 , adrenomedullin 14 ) Insulin resistance marker - HOMA-IR 15 ) Inflammatory marker - C-reactive protein ( CRP )
